Level 23 or 28+3 bonus.

item.title: Primal Predator Armor
item.fluff: When you change into beast form, the primal spirit within this armor grants you the power to bring down an escaping foe

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude and Will.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you shifts
EffectUntil the start of the triggering creature's next turn, you gain a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against it. The bonus equals this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rat Killer's Armor
item.fluff: This fur-rimmed jacket is favored by all who must deal with dangerous vermin

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 all against attacks from swarms.
Level 12 or 17Resist 10 all.
Level 22 or 27Resist 15 all.
In addition, you can move through a space occupied by a swarm, and your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from swarms.

item.title: Razor Armor
item.fluff: Jutting spikes and sharp edges cover each scale set into this armor

block.name: Property
block.line: When an enemy scores a critical hit against you with a melee attack, that enemy takes damage equal to 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier. This counts as melee Weapon damage if the attacker has resistance or other qualities related to it.
Level 12 or 17Equal to 2d10 + your Dexterity modifier.
Level 22 or 27Equal to 3d10 + your Dexterity modifier.

item.title: Reflexive Armor
item.fluff: This armor protects less dextrous wearers from the brunt of attacks that generally ignore armor

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are targeted by an attack against Reflex
EffectUntil the end of your next turn, your Reflex defense becomes equal to your AC.

item.title: Reinforcing Armor
item.fluff: This armor increases your protections when you aren't cautious enough to protect yourself

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take damage from a melee attack, you gain a +1 item bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Repulsion Armor
item.fluff: Inlaid with esoteric runes, this armor can repel even the most persistent foes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, you can use the following action at-will:
Immediate Interrupt: Trigger: An enemy moves into a square adjacent to you; You push the triggering enemy 1 square.
Level 22 or 272 squares.

item.title: Robe of Avoidance
item.fluff: When an enemy's attack misses you, this billowing robe confuses the foe so that you can get away

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy misses you with a melee attack
EffectYou shift 1 square.

item.title: Robe of Contingency
item.fluff: Stitched with thread from the Feywild, this robe is favored by many wizards for its ability to escape a bind

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be bloodied.
TriggerYou take damage
EffectYou teleport up to 6 squares.
During the teleport, you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

item.title: Robe of Eyes
item.fluff: This fine silk cloth appears to be covered in swirls of color or peacock feather patterns, but in fact depicts dozens of unblinking eyes

block.name: Property
block.line: You cannot be blinded.

item.title: Robe of Quills
item.fluff: Thin spines cover this robe, making any adversary reconsider before attacking the wearer

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn adjacent enemy makes a melee attack against you
EffectMelee 1 (the triggering enemy); The target takes 1d6 damage per plus of this armor, and ongoing damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals twice this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Robe of Scintillation
item.fluff: Made of fine silks, this robe sheds light when you want it to, and it can also unleash a swirling melange of color that befuddles foes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe robe radiates colored lights, illuminating like a torch.
You can end the illumination as a free action.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: The robe shines bright with myriad colors
AttackClose burst 2 (each creature in burst); item's level +5 vs. Will
Hit The target is dazed (save ends).
MissThe target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Robe of Useful Items
item.fluff: No matter what simple item you need, you can find it in one of this rove's many pockets

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou procure one nonmagical item worth up to 10 gp (with the DM's approval) from the robe. The item is generic (a torch or a rope, for instance), not a specific item (the key to a particular chest). The item lasts for 1 hour, then disappears.
Recharge: When the item disappears, you regain the use of this power.

item.title: Runic Armor
item.fluff: The arcane sigils engraved on this armor glow in the presence of magical emanations

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your second wind, you also gain a bonus to damage rolls with arcane attack powers until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Sanguine Vestments
item.fluff: The blood of wounded enemies only strengthens this deep red garment

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 bonus to all defenses while the oath target from your Oath of Enmity class feature is bloodied.

item.title: Salubrious Armor
item.fluff: The shiny steel of this armor flushes red when its wearer heals, bestowing extra defense

block.name: Property
block.line: Any time you regain hit points, you gain a +2 item bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Savage Armor
item.fluff: Grotesque faces contort on this armor's surface, howling with glee as the battle begins

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: You shrieak, and your armor howls with you
EffectClose burst 1 (each enemy adjacent to you); You push each target 1 square.
Level 22 or 272 squares.

item.title: Scale of the Serpent
item.fluff: Forged by fomorians from a strange green or of the Feywild, this armor makes you as slippery as a snake, physically and mentally

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an untyped bonus to escape attempts equal to this armor's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn effect dazes, immobilizes, slows, or stuns you
EffectYou make a saving throw against the triggering effect, even if it does not normally end on a save. On a success, the effect ends and you do not gain any aftereffects the effect might have.

item.title: Scorpion Carapace Armor
item.fluff: The spirit of the giant scorpion resides in this segmented armor

block.name: Property
block.line: Tremorsense does not allow a creature to detect you unless it has line of sight to you.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you willingly moves
AttackMelee 1 (the triggering enemy); item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
HitPoison damage equal to 3 + twice this armor's enhancement bonus, and the target is immobilized until the start of its next turn.

item.title: Screaming Armor
item.fluff: This impressive armor is covered in ornate patterns of screaming faces, enhancing your ability to shatter your foe's resolve

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (one creature that can hear you); The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
If you have training in the Intimidate skill, the penalty is (save ends) instead.

item.title: Serpentine Armor
item.fluff: Metallic snakes writhe along the surface of this armor, ready to strike at any foe that tries to get by you

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10 poison.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15 poison.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you shifts
EffectThe triggering enemy takes damage equal to 3 + twice this armor's enhancement bonus. You deal +5 additional damage if you have combat adcantage against the triggering enemy.
SpecialThis counts as a Weapon attack for any abilities the triggering enemy has.

item.title: Serpentskin Armor
item.fluff: Made from the discarded scales of a giant snake, this armor still glistens as though it was live, and allows you to slip past opponents

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou shift 3 squares. You can move through enemies' spaces during this shift, though you must end your move in a legal space.
Level 18, 23 or 28This power becomes an encounter power.

item.title: Shadow Hunter Hide
item.fluff: This shimmering black hide armor allows you to get the drop on your foes

block.name: Property
block.line: You can move 4 squares (instead of 2) during an action while you are hidden without taking a -5 penalty to Stealth checks.

item.title: Shaper's Armor
item.fluff: Your features seem to flow with each movement when you activate this nondescript armor

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.
Augment 2: The bonus increases to +4.
Each time an attack against your AC has been resolved, reduce the bonus by 1. When the bonus drops to +0, the effect immediately ends.

item.title: Shimmering Armor
item.fluff: The sheen of this armor glints brightest when you most need its magical protection

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +4 item bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by making a ranged or area attack.

item.title: Skald's Armor
item.fluff: A favorite item of wandering bards, this armor enhances your ability to talk your way out of tight situation

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy targets you with a melee attack
EffectThe triggering attack instead targets a creature of your choice adjacent to you.

item.title: Slick Armor
item.fluff: It's hard to get a hold on you while you wear this armor

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an untyped bonus to escape attempts equal to this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Spiked Jacket
item.fluff: Hidden razor-sharp spikes spring out from the elbows, shoulders, and sides of this jacket when something grabs you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be grabbed
EffectYou escape the grab, and the enemy grabbing you takes 1d6 damage per plus.

item.title: Stanching Armor
item.fluff: This form-fitting armor clings to you as if it were a second skin, sealing your wounds

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Saving throws against untyped ongoing damage

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value + twice this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Stoneborn Armor
item.fluff: Worked from rough stone, the plates of this bulky armor enable its wearer to tap into the limitless endurance of the earth

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain 15 temporary hit points that last until depleted or until you take an extended rest, whichever comes first.
Level 821 temporary hit points.
Level 1327 temporary hit points.
Level 1833 temporary hit points.
Level 2340 temporary hit points.
Level 2850 temporary hit points.

item.title: Stoneskin Robes
item.fluff: In battle, these gray robes harden your skin and grant additional resilience

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain 5 temporary hit points until the end of the encounter.
Level 13 or 187 temporary hit points.
Level 23 or 2810 temporary hit points.

item.title: Sylvan Armor
item.fluff: This brown and gray armor is favored by those who want to move like a leaf carried along on a forest breeze

item.title: Thought-Eater Armor
item.fluff: The gaze of your enemies seems to slide off this nondescript armor, almost as if you weren't there

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, you have concealment against enemies that are more than 2 squares away from you.
Augment 1: Total concealment instead of concealment.

Augment 2: Total concealment instead of concealment, and if you used this augment outside of combat, the power lasts for 1 hour and you can use this concealment to hide. If combat starts, the concealment ends at the start of your first turn.
Special (Level 18, 23 or 28): As part of a short rest, you can expend a healing surge to recharge this power.

item.title: Time Link Armor
item.fluff: Woven from shimmering crystal, this light chain suit improves your reaction time
item.headline: Item BonusInitiative checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll initiative and dislike the result
EffectYou reroll the triggering initiative check, but must use the second result.
If the second result is worse than the triggering result, you regain the use of this power after your next short rest.

item.title: Versatile Armor
item.fluff: The wearer of this armor moves with more alacrity than one might expect, and can employ that speed to his or her advantage against unprepared enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou take a -1 penalty to AC, but ignore any penalties to speed and checks caused by this armor. This persists until you use a minor action to end this effect, or until the end of your next rest, whichever comes first.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend an action point, you gain a +1 item bonus to all attack rolls and defenses until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have an action point available
EffectYou spend an action point to regain one encounter power of your choice.

item.title: Vigorous Resolve Vestments
item.fluff: These embroided vestments channel your resolve and imbue you with resilience

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude.

item.title: Wall Armor
item.fluff: This armor seems far heavier than its constituent material, and it can become as unforgiving as a brick wall at a moment's notice

item.title: Venomous Songblade
item.fluff: Like the words you whisper to your enemies, this weapon is filled with poison that saps their strength

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits or misses you with a bull rush or charge attack
EffectThe triggering enemy takes 1d6 damage per plus and is knocked prone.

item.title: Warding Spirit Armor
item.fluff: The primal power infused within this leather armor draws power from your spirit companion to shield you from attack when your guard is down

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC against opportunity attacks while your spirit companion is present in the encounter.
The bonus increases to +4 if your spirit companion is within 2 squares of you.

item.title: Warmage's Uniform
item.fluff: These decorated greatcoats come in a variety of styles, but all lend military might to their wearers

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an arcane attack power

EffectChoose one ally within 5 squares of the triggering enemy. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen ally gains a power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy. The power bonus equals this armor's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Whiteflame armor
item.fluff: This armor absorbs light and can be converted to protect against other effects

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 radiant.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou change the resist you gain from this armor to one of resist fire, resist lightning, or resist thunder. This lasts until the end of the encounter.
